Should there be tuition fees for studying in Germany?

node.surface: Tuition fees should not be charged in Germany.

node.category: Why should there be no tuition fees in Germany?

node.surface: Studying and taking higher degrees must remain a basic right for everyone.

node.category: What about fees makes studying and taking higher degrees difficult for some people?

node.surface: Fees result in longer durations of studies.

node.category: Why is studying longer a problem?
